requirement: Frontmatter includes solver_ralph.schema, id, type, version, status, authority_kind, governed_by, refs.
how_to_verify: Confirm YAML frontmatter parses and required keys are present; confirm version matches file name.

requirement: Document includes a Version changes section describing what changed in this version.
how_to_verify: Check §0 exists and enumerates deltas for v1.3.0-draft.1.

requirement: Defines minimum instantiated portal IDs: GovernanceChangePortal, ReleaseApprovalPortal, ExceptionApprovalPortal.
how_to_verify: Verify §3.1 contains the three portal IDs exactly; confirm instance portal set satisfies this.

check_name: Portal-function aliasing rule is explicit and bounded
requirement: Permits portal-function aliasing without changing binding semantics; requires explicit request typing + attributable human approval + evidence refs.
how_to_verify: Read §3.2; ensure it constrains aliasing (no semantic changes) and requires explicit records.

check_name: Routing matrix covers required change kinds and portal functions
requirement: Routing matrix exists and includes (at minimum) governance change, current selection change, oracle suite change, exception change, phase gate, budget extension, release approval.
how_to_verify: Inspect §3.3 table; ensure required rows exist and notes do not permit silent bypass.
auto_notes: Table header found; required keywords checked.

requirement: Freeze artifact_manifest[] includes canonical governed set (and versions in force).
how_to_verify: Confirm §5.1 specifies canonical governed set inclusion; confirm canonical set enumerated in metadata / text.

check_name: Instance inputs included in freeze for replayability
requirement: If instance uses SR-PLAN + directive-owned control surfaces, Freeze MUST include SR-PLAN instance + SR-DIRECTIVE + control surfaces (Gate Registry / Profile Definitions / Portal Playbooks).
how_to_verify: Confirm §5.2 contains bullets for SR-PLAN instance, SR-DIRECTIVE, and control surfaces.
auto_notes: Checked for SR-PLAN, SR-DIRECTIVE, and control surface keywords.

requirement: Non-waivable list includes ORACLE_TAMPER, ORACLE_ENV_MISMATCH, ORACLE_GAP, ORACLE_FLAKE, EVIDENCE_MISSING.
how_to_verify: Verify §6.2 and/or §7.1 includes these items and states they are not eligible for Gate Waiver.

requirement: Required↔Advisory or environment constraint changes must be explicitly routed/approved; cannot be implicit.
how_to_verify: Confirm §7.2 states explicit routing/approval and forbids silent weakening.
auto_notes: Found §7.2 heading; checked for required/advisory language.

requirement: Defines when Decision records are required and how they route via portal function to instance portal IDs (with aliasing allowed).
how_to_verify: Confirm §8.1 lists required cases (stop triggers, budget extension, phase gates, proceed anyway) and §8.2 defines routing.
auto_notes: Found decision record requirement language and §8.2 heading.

requirement: Defines emergency change workflow including later ratification/audit and required records/evidence.
how_to_verify: Review §9; confirm it cannot bypass integrity constraints and still produces required records.

requirement: Defines how SR-CHANGE can amend itself safely, including approvals and versioning.
how_to_verify: Review §10; ensure it requires explicit approval and does not allow silent updates.

requirement: If an instance only instantiates GovernanceChangePortal/ReleaseApprovalPortal/ExceptionApprovalPortal, SR-CHANGE must still be satisfiable via portal-function aliasing for OracleSuiteChange/PhaseGate/BudgetExtension/Decision.
how_to_verify: Confirm §3.1 minimum is three portals and §3.2 aliasing allows additional portal functions to be routed through existing portals without semantics loss.
auto_notes: Minimum portals ok; aliasing keyword present.
